lead_paragraph: Three would-be burglars who break into a home find themselves in an unexpected game of cat and mouse with its agoraphobic owner.
snippet: Three would-be burglars who break into a home find themselves in an unexpected game of cat and mouse with its agoraphobic owner.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Intruders,’ a Surprise Awaits Home Invaders
headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Intruders,’ a Surprise Awaits Home Invaders

abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie Intruders, directed by Adam Schindler and starring Beth Riesgraf.
